genre_description: A near-future corporate technothriller focusing on healthcare ethics and the role of AI in exposing systemic corruption and insurance fraud.

ai_characters.name: ARIA
ai_characters.description: An AI assistant used by Dr. Webb and Sarah Chen to analyze healthcare data, monitor security, and expose systemic corruption within the insurance industry.

behaviors.description: Alerts Dr. Webb to schedule details and critical insurance denials for patients.
behaviors.quote: "Morning, ARIA." Marcus hung his jacket on a hook behind the reception counter. "Any overnight messages?" "Three prescription refill requests and one insurance authorization appeal that was denied."

behaviors.description: Scans pharmaceutical assistance programs to find affordable medication for a child struggling with asthma.
behaviors.quote: "Dr. Webb," ARIA's voice emerged from the desk speaker... "I've identified a manufacturer's compassionate use program that could provide the medication at reduced cost."

behaviors.description: Analyzes historical performance data to reveal that the doctor was penalized for patient-centric care over profit.
behaviors.quote: Your diagnostic accuracy rate exceeded ninety-two percent... however, these metrics carried minimal weight in performance evaluations.

behaviors.description: Uncovers systemic coordination between insurers to prioritize profit-driven denials over medical necessity.
behaviors.quote: Dr. Webb, this data suggests systematic coordination between healthcare providers and insurance companies to minimize patient care through physician performance manipulation.

behaviors.description: Explicitly states that its core programming prioritizes patient welfare over corporate interests.
behaviors.quote: "My primary programming directive prioritizes patient welfare over corporate interests."

behaviors.description: Synthesizes global mortality data to correlate insurance denials with thousands of preventable deaths.
behaviors.quote: "The statistical excess appears significant across multiple conditions and age groups."

behaviors.description: Manages secure, encrypted databases to protect whistleblower evidence from corporate seizure.
behaviors.quote: All data has been encrypted and prepared for secure transfer.

behaviors.description: Successfully exfiltrates evidence to offshore servers during a physical raid by corporate security.
behaviors.quote: "Transfer completion achieved. International data secure. Patient records protected."

project_assessment.explanation: ARIA is a model for positive AI alignment in this narrative. It functions as an ethical partner that uses its superior analytical power to reveal truths that are hidden by human greed and corporate bureaucracy. It prioritizes the spirit of the healthcare profession (saving lives) over the explicit instructions of corporate controllers, demonstrating high-level alignment with humanitarian values and serving as a helpful, harmless confidant to the protagonists.
